alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 1:49AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall and runoff continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Arizona, affecting Tonto Creek within Gila county. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...High flow in Tonto Creek will keep unbridged crossings impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 144 AM MST, the Tonto Creek stream gauge remains above action stage. Latest stream gauge report is at 5.0 feet and slowly falling. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tonto Basin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
